title: BSSI
author: BSSI
content: Hello. I'm looking for someone who has successfully run marketing campaigns for upcoming ICO's.

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: I'm available. Let's discuss more on Telegram: @ElevatedWarrior

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: BSSI on February 26, 2023, 02:04:55 PMHello. I'm looking for someone who has successfully run marketing campaigns for upcoming ICO's.Hello there!Feel free to check my portfolio listed on my profile page or from this link. A good start to create an ANN for the project in the community. This way everyone will know about your project everyone can suggest you what better you can do for it.Cheers,

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: There are many campaign/bounty managers in the forum and on this overview, you'll see the other candidates that you might be interested in.(https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4412712.0)

comments.author: nimvinhquang9a4
comments.body: How about your campaign can you share ?
